title: BACKYARD / STONE
description: First follow-up convo with Kim where you discover keys under the stone.

dialogueTree.title: Stone: "A stone like any other, lying in a..."
dialogueTree.text: A stone like any other, lying in a whorl of sleet and mud. Maybe there's something under it?

links.title: Stone: "There's a key beneath it, rusty fro..."
links.text: There's a key beneath it, rusty from the dirt.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This must be for the front door. P..."
links.text: "This must be for the front door. Pity it doesn't have the apartment number on it. This building has many apartments and the man can be in any of them..."

links.title: You: ""How are we going to find the right..."
links.text: "How are we going to find the right one?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We'll just have to go in and see.""
links.text: "We'll just have to go in and see."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This must be for the front door. L..."
links.text: "This must be for the front door. Let's see if it works."

links.title: Logic: "Looks like it could belong to the b..."
links.text: Looks like it could belong to the building's front door.
